00014 static const time_t MIN_SECONDS_TO_SUBMIT       = 240;
00015 static const time_t MIN_TRACK_LENGTH_TO_SUBMIT  = 30;
00016 static const time_t MIN_SECS_BETWEEN_CONNECT    = 60;
00017 static const time_t MAX_SECS_BETWEEN_CONNECT    = 7200;

00019 LastFmScrobbler::LastFmScrobbler(const string& user, const string& pass, bool synchronous)
00020 : m_pLastFmClient(new LastFmClient())
00021 , m_LastConnectionAttempt(0)
00022 , m_TrackPlayTime(-1)
00023 , m_TrackResumeTime(0)
00024 , m_AuthenticateThread(LastFmScrobbler::authenticateThread, this)
00025 , m_SendInfoThread(LastFmScrobbler::sendInfoThread, this)
00026 , m_Authenticated(false)
00027 , m_HardConnectionFailureCount(0)
00028 , m_Username(user)
00029 , m_Password(pass)
00030 , m_Log("/tmp/lastfmliblog.txt")
00031 , m_Synchronous(synchronous)
00032 {
00033     authenticateIfNecessary();
00034 }

00051 LastFmScrobbler::~LastFmScrobbler()
00052 {
00053     joinThreads();
00054     delete m_pLastFmClient;
00055 }

00057 void LastFmScrobbler::startedPlaying(const SubmissionInfo& info)
00058 {
00059     authenticateIfNecessary();
00060 
00061     m_Log.info("startedPlaying " + info.getTrack());
00062     m_PreviousTrackInfo = m_CurrentTrackInfo;
00063     m_CurrentTrackInfo = info;
00064 
00065     m_TrackPlayTime = 0;
00066     m_TrackResumeTime = m_CurrentTrackInfo.getTimeStarted();
00067 
00068     if (m_CurrentTrackInfo.getTimeStarted() < 0)
00069     {
00070         m_CurrentTrackInfo.setTimeStarted(time(NULL));
00071     }
00072 
00073     if (m_Synchronous)
00074     {
00075         submitTrack(m_PreviousTrackInfo);
00076         setNowPlaying();
00077     }
00078     else
00079     {
00080         m_SendInfoThread.start();
00081     }
00082 }
00083 
00084 void LastFmScrobbler::pausePlaying(bool paused)
00085 {
00086     time_t curTime = time(NULL);
00087     if (paused)
00088     {
00089         m_TrackPlayTime += curTime - m_CurrentTrackInfo.getTimeStarted();
00090     }
00091     else
00092     {
00093         m_TrackResumeTime = curTime;
00094     }
00095 }
00096 
00097 void LastFmScrobbler::finishedPlaying()
00098 {
00099     authenticateIfNecessary();
00100     if (m_Synchronous)
00101     {
00102         submitTrack(m_CurrentTrackInfo);
00103     }
00104     else
00105     {
00106         m_Log.error("async finish not implemented yet!!");
00107     }
00108 }

00110 bool LastFmScrobbler::trackCanBeCommited(const SubmissionInfo& info)
00111 {
00112     time_t curTime = time(NULL);
00113     m_TrackPlayTime += curTime - m_TrackResumeTime;
00114 
00115     bool trackTooShort = info.getTrackLength() < MIN_TRACK_LENGTH_TO_SUBMIT;
00116     bool trackPlayedLongEnough =
00117             m_TrackPlayTime >= MIN_SECONDS_TO_SUBMIT
00118         ||  m_TrackPlayTime >= (info.getTrackLength() / 2);
00119 
00120     if (trackTooShort)
00121     {
00122         m_Log.info("Track \"" + info.getTrack() + "\" can't be committed: length is too short");
00123     }
00124     else if (!trackPlayedLongEnough)
00125     {
00126         m_Log.info("Track \"" + info.getTrack() + "\" can't be committed: not played long enough");
00127     }
00128     else
00129     {
00130         m_Log.info("Track \"" + info.getTrack() + "\" can be committed: conditions OK");
00131     }
00132 
00133     return (!trackTooShort) && trackPlayedLongEnough;
00134 }
00135 
00136 void LastFmScrobbler::authenticateIfNecessary()
00137 {
00138     if (!m_Authenticated &&
00139         !m_AuthenticateThread.isRunning() &&
00140         canReconnect())
00141     {
00142         if (m_Synchronous)
00143         {
00144             authenticate();
00145         }
00146         else
00147         {
00148             m_AuthenticateThread.start();
00149         }
00150     }
00151 }
00152 
00153 void LastFmScrobbler::authenticate()
00154 {
00155     try
00156     {
00157         m_pLastFmClient->handshake(m_Username, m_Password);
00158         m_Log.info("Authentication successfull for user: " + m_Username);
00159         m_HardConnectionFailureCount = 0;
00160         m_Authenticated = true;
00161     }
00162     catch (ConnectionError& e)
00163     {
00164         ++m_HardConnectionFailureCount;
00165         m_LastConnectionAttempt = time(NULL);
00166     }
00167     catch (logic_error& e)
00168     {
00169         m_Log.error(e.what());
00170     }
00171 }
00172 
00173 bool LastFmScrobbler::canReconnect()
00174 {
00175     time_t curTime = time(NULL);
00176     time_t timeSinceLastConnectionAttempt = curTime - m_LastConnectionAttempt;
00177     time_t connectionDelay = max(MAX_SECS_BETWEEN_CONNECT, m_HardConnectionFailureCount * MIN_SECS_BETWEEN_CONNECT);
00178 
00179     return timeSinceLastConnectionAttempt > connectionDelay;
00180 }
00181 
00182 void* LastFmScrobbler::authenticateThread(void* pInstance)
00183 {
00184     LastFmScrobbler* pScrobbler = reinterpret_cast<LastFmScrobbler*>(pInstance);
00185     pScrobbler->m_Log.info("Authenticate thread started");
00186 
00187     pScrobbler->authenticate();
00188 
00189     {
00190         ScopedLock lock(pScrobbler->m_AuthenticatedMutex);
00191         pScrobbler->m_AuthenticatedCondition.broadcast();
00192     }
00193 
00194     pScrobbler->m_Log.info("Authenticate thread finished");
00195     return NULL;
00196 }
00197 
00198 void* LastFmScrobbler::sendInfoThread(void* pInstance)
00199 {
00200     LastFmScrobbler* pScrobbler = reinterpret_cast<LastFmScrobbler*>(pInstance);
00201     pScrobbler->m_Log.info("sendInfo thread started");
00202 
00203     {
00204         ScopedLock lock(pScrobbler->m_AuthenticatedMutex);
00205         if (!pScrobbler->m_Authenticated)
00206         {
00207             if (!pScrobbler->m_AuthenticatedCondition.wait(pScrobbler->m_AuthenticatedMutex, 4000))
00208             {
00209                 pScrobbler->m_Log.info("send info terminated because no connection");
00210                 pScrobbler->submitTrack(pScrobbler->m_PreviousTrackInfo);
00211                 return NULL;
00212             }
00213         }
00214     }
00215 
00216     if (pScrobbler->m_Authenticated)
00217     {
00218         pScrobbler->submitTrack(pScrobbler->m_PreviousTrackInfo);
00219         pScrobbler->setNowPlaying();
00220     }
00221 
00222     pScrobbler->m_Log.info("sendInfo thread finished");
00223     return NULL;
00224 }
00225 
00226 void LastFmScrobbler::setNowPlaying()
00227 {
00228     if (!m_Authenticated)
00229     {
00230         m_Log.info("Can't set Now Playing status: not authenticated");
00231         return;
00232     }
00233 
00234     try
00235     {
00236         m_pLastFmClient->nowPlaying(m_CurrentTrackInfo);
00237         m_Log.info("Now playing info submitted: " + m_CurrentTrackInfo.getArtist() + " - " + m_CurrentTrackInfo.getTrack());
00238     }
00239     catch (ConnectionError& e)
00240     {
00241         m_Authenticated = false;
00242     }
00243     catch (logic_error& e)
00244     {
00245         m_Log.error(e.what());
00246     }
00247 }
00248 
00249 void LastFmScrobbler::submitTrack(const SubmissionInfo& info)
00250 {
00251     if (info.getTrackLength() < 0 || !trackCanBeCommited(info))
00252     {
00253         m_Log.info("Won't submit");
00254         return;
00255     }
00256     else
00257     {
00258         ScopedLock lock(m_TrackInfosMutex);
00259         m_BufferedTrackInfos.addInfo(info);
00260     }
00261 
00262     SubmissionInfoCollection tracksToSubmit;
00263     {
00264         ScopedLock lock(m_TrackInfosMutex);
00265         tracksToSubmit = m_BufferedTrackInfos;
00266     }
00267 
00268     try
00269     {
00270         if (m_Authenticated)
00271         {
00272             m_pLastFmClient->submit(tracksToSubmit);
00273             m_Log.info("Buffered tracks submitted");
00274             m_BufferedTrackInfos.clear();
00275         }
00276         else
00277         {
00278             m_Log.info("Track info buffered: not connected");
00279         }
00280     }
00281     catch (ConnectionError& e)
00282     {
00283         m_Authenticated = false;
00284     }
00285     catch (logic_error& e)
00286     {
00287         m_Log.error(e.what());
00288     }
00289 }
00290 
00291 void LastFmScrobbler::joinThreads()
00292 {
00293     if (m_Synchronous)
00294     {
00295         return;
00296     }
00297 
00298     {
00299         ScopedLock lock(m_AuthenticatedMutex);
00300         m_AuthenticatedCondition.broadcast();
00301     }
00302 
00303     m_AuthenticateThread.join();
00304     m_SendInfoThread.join();
00305 }
